item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: This is an example post made with Hugo. 123456 // This is a comment #include <stdio.h>int main(void) { puts("This is some example code"); return 0; } And this is a list of items to be printed This is a blockquote should have a background

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a programming enthusiast from the DFW area. I generally go by jpadkins online. If you see someone with that name, chances are it’s me. I’ve got a thing for webdev, Ruby, C, CRPGS, Roguelikes, cult/exploitation/B films, old pulp sci-fi and fantasy novels, comparative mythology, and IRL exploration, so that’s what you can expect me to write about. Mostly. Q & A Q: Why does your website look like it was designed by someone in the 90s?
